text: Tried their new overload burgers and am not disappointed! With the unlimited sauce refill, was even better! Visited their Vivocity outlet at 2pm and there is minimal crowd and had a great chit chat with a friend.

Excellent curry here! We were so surprised by the portion and so glad we came here for our gathering. We we ate here:
- Super Monster Combo ($35) (good For 2-3 pax, 41cm bowl) - - Teppan YAKI beef (100g), tonkatsu (180g), fried fish fillet, ebi tempura, Three-egg omelette, flame-torched mozzarella, rice, salad & pickled red ginger

- YAKI Pork Omelette Curry ($15.90) (Solo, 35cm bowl), Teppan YAKI pork belly, three-egg omelette, rice, salad & pickled red ginger

Highly recommended!
Went on a weekend and was easily able to get a table. Staff were really friendly and gave us a table that had more space for us to feed/take care of our baby. Food is always great here, no complains.

I would like to say the salad that I had was fantastic and the presentation was good. Worth for the price. Stating the fact that their drink mango mock-tails sets a finish touch to the meal.

It's my few times seeing fruits in a salad which set a bursting flavours in my pallets. Great service given by a guy and Fei ting I commend their service!

To those who come to Vivo to dine at anywhere try this place great place to bring your family!

Delicious food! We had the chicken katsu curry with added omelette and the steak omelette curryâ€”YUM! The chicken and steak were both cooked perfectly and were so so so good! We also had a cranberry lemonade cocktail. Would definitely come back!
